title: Calculations
description: Calculation tools: calories, age, compound interest, fuel consumption and simulators.

tools.title: Age Calculator
tools.description: Calculate age from birthdate and compare between dates. Provides detailed breakdown in years, months and days.
tools.keywords: age, calculator, calculate age, birthdate, age calculator

tools.title: Calorie Calculator
tools.description: Estimate daily calorie needs (BMR) and maintenance calories using Mifflin-St Jeor and activity multipliers.
tools.keywords: calorie calculator, bmr, mifflin st jeor, daily calories, maintenance calories

tools.title: Fuel Consumption Calculator
tools.description: Calculate fuel consumption and costs (daily, biweekly, monthly, semiannual, annual) based on your daily mileage.
tools.keywords: fuel, consumption, liters, cost, gas, calculator, fuel calculator

tools.title: Compound Interest Calculator
tools.description: Calculate future value with compound interest. Supports periodic contributions, configurable compounding and detailed breakdowns.
tools.keywords: compound interest, investment, future value, interest calculator, financial calculator

tools.title: Calculadora de Salário
tools.description: Calcule seu salário líquido CLT com descontos de INSS e IRRF

tools.title: Ads Earnings Simulator
tools.description: Estimate and compare monthly ad revenue from AdSense and competitors using RPM, CTR and CPC.
tools.keywords: adsense, ad revenue, rpm, cpc, ctr, simulator
